text:
This cartoon in an excellent reminder that vaccines are an incredible tool to protect us from many diseases. It is amazing that in such a short time frame, #covid19 has joined the list of #vaccine preventable diseases. 

#smallpoxeradicated 
#getcovidvaccinated💉 ASAP https://t.co/Jz7Z1fyhaw https://t.co/JigTfS60Y0
